alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau, northeastern Duval and east central Charlton Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Callahan, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline, Talbot Island and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
